Name: Wisdom Getaway Holiday Planner
Title: Driver hai tho aisa !!!
Review: A Tour Operator puts all out efforts to ensure a hassle free and pleasant trip to the guests. But the icing on the cake rests in the hands of the chauffeur. My guests were extremely satisfied with driver Mr. Amit from Tirupati Travels and all praises to him for the behaviour, promptness, knowledge of the places. Can't expect anything more from a travel service personnel by a Tour Planner like me.Kudos to Jaspal Ji and his team in Tirupati Travels.Ramachandran OwnerWisdom Getaway (Holiday Planner)

Name: Tirupaticabs
Title: Great Cab Service provider in North India
Review: I highly recommend Tirupati cabs for everyone traveling to Delhi and beyond.  Our cab was clean and well maintained and our driver  Lucky singhji was polite and well versed with the roads. What touched me the most was the owner's kind and helpful attitude.  My son forgot his cellphone in the cab and when we realized, it was too late as we were done with our security check at the Delhi Airport and we could not go out or anyone could come in to give the phone. Our driver deposited the phone in the company. The owner Mr. Jaspal Singh was so kind and helpful that he immediately couriered the phone to my home address in Ahmedabad. Under 24 hours we got back the phone and my son was so happy to have his phone back. Special thanks to Luckybhai,  Mr. Jaspal Singh and Tirupati cabs. You have gained our trust.Truly a happy customer. Thank you üòä
